Rev. Charles Favors right gift presented him
by Dr. Boara Messrs Kahon Gosa of Punab who we're
guests at the Robert Bankses home Sunday
The gift finely cotton
pants.


The Punjab visitors departed Monday Tucson.


FOR PHOTOS CALL


276-23OIoR 276-4329

WASHINGTON j Five outstand-
ing graduates Of Howard Univer-
sity will receive alumni achieve
ment awards Mar. at the 9th
anniversary founding celebra-
ton.


Awardees will be DR.. Roy A.
Anduze. a 1889 graduate, chief
surgeon at Knud-Hansen Memo
rial Hospital, Virgin Islands: DR..
Errold D. Collymore. 19l8grad-
uate Of the defunct Howard Acad-
envy. civic and political leader
for 80 years: James Farmer,
organizer of CORE; DR.. Lillian
Lewis. 1925 graduate, professor
Of biology atWinston-Salem State
Teachers College, and Miss
Flake Pinkett, President of the
Pinkett Real Estate Co., and
vice president Of the Washington
Real Estate Brokers Assn.

S GRADUATES TO


BE HONORED AT 9th
HOWARD UNIVERSITY
FOUNDING PROGRAM

Almost all white silks are safely
sudsable, but do tend to yellow
from heat. So iron silk on the
wrong side using a cool iron over
a clean cloth.

JACKSON, Miss. = Stars Of the
television show bonanza" have
refused to make a scheduled per-
sonal appearance here February
IL. after being notified by the
NAACP that the audience would
be segregated.


Lorne Greene, Michael Landon
and Dan Blocker wired show pro-
motors, which is to be staged
at the State Fair Coliseum, they
will not come to Jackson unless
they are guaranteed the spec
tators will be unsegregated.


Dan Blocker, who plays
"Hoss," also made known his
stand in a personal letter to
Charles Evers, NAACP Missis-
sippi field secretary, who had
called upon the trio to cancel
the engagement in view of the
segregation.


IL have long been in sympathy
with the Negro struggle for total
citizenship" wrote MIR. Blocker,
therefore, | would find an ap-
pearance of any sort before a
segregated house completely in
compatible with my moral con-
cepts. indeed repugnant."


Blocker said he and the others
we're assured when they signed
the contract that the audience
would be integrated.

BONAZA STARS


REFUSE TO PLAY
SEGREGATED SHOW
